aboutSection.subtitle: Salut Orphelins et Malades Infectés
aboutSection.description: Through our initiatives, we strive to combat stigma, promote social inclusion, and empower communities to build resilient futures. SOMI Haiti is dedicated to making a lasting impact on the lives of those we serve, promoting dignity, hope, and well-being.

tabContent.Mission: We aim to combat stigma, promote social inclusion, and empower communities by offering psychological support, educational assistance, healthcare services, and economic aid. Through our dedicated efforts, we strive to foster resilience, dignity, and hope among those we serve.
tabContent.Vision: We envision a future where communities are empowered, resilient, and inclusive, with equal opportunities for all. SOMI Haiti is committed to creating lasting positive change and building a brighter, healthier future for the people of Haiti.

causeSection.subtitle: Our Causes
causeSection.description: Our organisation is dedicated to making a lasting impact on life by resources and support to those in need.

content.Health Care: We are dedicated to ensuring access to healthcare services for all. We strive to improve health outcomes and promote well-being.
content.Education: We aim to empower these children with the knowledge and skills they need to build a brighter future for themselves and their communities.
content.Empowerment: Foster community development through economic empowerment, social and infrastructure improvement projects.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: This page outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data and explains how we safeguard your information.

content.content: We do not collect any personal information from visitors to our website. Personal information refers to data that can be used to identify an individual, such as name, email address, or phone number. You can browse our site anonymously without the need to disclose any personal data.

We do not use cookies or other tracking technologies on our website. Cookies are small files stored on your device that are used to track your browsing behavior. While we do not use cookies ourselves, please note that third-party services integrated into our site, such as embedded videos or social media widgets, may use cookies or similar technologies. We do not have control over these third-party services and encourage you to review their privacy policies.

Our website may contain links to third-party websites for your convenience. These third-party sites have their own privacy policies, which may differ from ours. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these websites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.

Our website is not directed to children under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are under 13 years of age, please do not provide any personal information on our website. If you believe that we may have inadvertently collected personal information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately, and we will take appropriate steps to delete such information.

While we do not collect personal data, we take appropriate security measures to protect any non-personal information collected through our website from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. We regularly review our security procedures to ensure they are up-to-date and effective.

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the effective date will be indicated at the top of the page. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Your continued use of the site after the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of such changes.

If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy or the practices of our website, please contact us at [contact email or address]. We are committed to addressing any inquiries or complaints promptly and transparently.
